channel.title: [317]Changing amount of npcs
channel.description: How can I change the amount of NPCs that are spawnable throughout my autospawn.CFG ? I've been looking through my files and I can't seem to find it. It is a 317 source. Thanks.

item.title: [317]Changing amount of npcs
item.dc:creator: @Christmas_tree Christmas_tree
item.description:
@Christmas_tree wrote:

If it’s loading from a .cfg, find the method that loads the config file and change it so that it doesn’t require a specific integer amount of NPC’s maximum.

I feel however this may be your main NPC handling code.

Read full topic

item.title: [317]Changing amount of npcs
item.dc:creator: @Remake Remake
item.description:
@Remake wrote:

I did find this in my npchandler
public static int maxNPCs = 100000;
public static int maxListedNPCs = 100000;
public static int maxNPCDrops = 10000;
but that was already boosted to 100k, which I only have about 1.5k monsters with only 500 different NPCs (1.5k with multiple spawns).

Read full topic

item.title: [317]Changing amount of npcs
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

Use the same method that the doors use. There should be a limit on how many doors you can add but you can easily change that. Check out ObjectHandler and search fo rloadDoorConfig.

Read full topic

item.title: [317]Changing amount of npcs
item.dc:creator: @Remake Remake
item.description:
@Remake wrote:

lol how don’t you get it?
Okay, lets say my source only allowed 100 different npcs to be spawned at the same time,
and I want to put 101 different npcs, but it wont allow it and it will not let the server start up.
how do I change the 100 npc amount, to 101?

Read full topic
